components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services
components.description: Sites and services that Cloudflare customers use to interact with the Cloudflare Network and its provided services

components.name: Access
components.description: Cloudflare's cloud identity & access management service

components.name: Always Online
components.description: Cloudflare's Always Online crawling and caching service

components.name: Analytics
components.description: Cloudflare customer analytics aggregation service

components.name: API
components.description: Cloudflare's API where customers can read from and write to their configurations at https://api.cloudflare.com

components.name: Authoritative DNS
components.description: Cloudflare's authoritative DNS service

components.name: Billing
components.description: Cloudflare's Billing and Payment service

components.name: Bring Your Own IP (BYOIP)
components.description: Allows Cloudflare customer's to advertise their own IPs for use with Magic Transit, Spectrum, or CDN services.

components.name: Bot Management
components.description: Bot Management provides sophisticated bot protection for your domain. Customers can identify automated traffic, take appropriate action, and view detailed analytics within the dashboard. Bot Management also supports custom solutions via Workers and Logs.

components.name: CDN Cache Purge
components.description: Cloudflare's CDN single file cache purging service

components.name: Community Site
components.description: Cloudflare's Community forums where customers can interact, ask questions and get help at https://community.cloudflare.com

components.name: Dashboard
components.description: Cloudflare's Dashboard where customers can view and make changes to their configurations at https://dash.cloudflare.com

components.name: Developer's Site
components.description: Cloudflare's public facing developer website at https://developers.cloudflare.com

components.name: Digital Experience Monitoring (DEX)
components.description: Digital Experience Monitoring (DEX) enables Zero Trust administrators to pinpoint and resolve issues impacting end-user connectivity and performance.

components.name: Distributed Web Gateway
components.description: Cloudflare's Distributed Web Gateway - https://developers.cloudflare.com/distributed-web/

components.name: DNS Updates
components.description: Cloudflare's DNS update service pushing customer DNS changes out to all data centers

components.name: Email Routing
components.description: Cloudflare's Email Routing service allowing for forwarding of email traffic

components.name: Ethereum Gateway
components.description: https://developers.cloudflare.com/web3/ethereum-gateway/

components.name: Gateway
components.description: Cloudflare’s secure web gateway keeps your data safe from malware, ransomware, phishing, command & control, Shadow IT, and other Internet risks over all ports and protocols. Log every user interaction with rich details.

components.name: Geo-Key Manager
components.description: Cloudflare's Keyless SSL management service

components.name: Images
components.description: Cloudflare service to build a scalable image pipeline to store, resize, optimize and deliver images in a fast and secure manner.

components.name: Load Balancing and Monitoring
components.description: Cloudflare's load balancing and failover service including origin server monitoring

components.name: Logs
components.description: Cloudflare's Enterprise Log pull and Log push service

components.name: Magic WAN
components.description: Magic WAN replaces legacy WAN architectures with Cloudflare’s network, providing global connectivity, cloud-based security, performance, and control through one simple user interface.

components.name: Marketing Site
components.description: Cloudflare's public facing marketing website at https://www.cloudflare.com

components.name: Mirage
components.description: Automatic Responsive Web Design via Intelligent Image Loading

components.name: Salt Lake City, UT, United States - (SLC)
São José do Rio Preto, Brazil - (SJP)
R2
components.description: High-performance storage for files and objects with zero egress charges

components.name: Randomness Beacon
components.description: Cloudflare's distributed service for randomness - https://developers.cloudflare.com/randomness-beacon/

components.name: Recursive DNS
components.description: Cloudflare's free recursive DNS service at 1.1.1.1 and 1.0.0.1

components.name: Registrar
components.description: Cloudflare Registrar securely registers and manages customer domain names

components.name: Spectrum
components.description: Cloudflare's Spectrum service allowing for proxying of all TCP ports

components.name: Stream
components.description: Cloudflare's on-demand end-to-end CDN video streaming service

components.name: SSL Certificate Provisioning
components.description: Cloudflare's SSL certificate provisioning service (Universal and Dedicated SSL)

components.name: SSL for SaaS Provisioning
components.description: Cloudflare's SSL for SaaS certificate provisioning service (custom hostnames)

components.name: Support Site
components.description: Cloudflare's knowledge base and support ticket portal at https://support.cloudflare.com

components.name: Time Services
components.description: Time Services provided in NTP, NTS & Roughtime - https://developers.cloudflare.com/time-services/

components.name: Tunnel
components.description: Cloudflare's encrypted origin server tunnel service

components.name: Turnstile
components.description: Turnstile is a user-friendly, privacy-preserving alternative to CAPTCHA.

components.name: Waiting Room
components.description: Cloudflare Waiting Room protects websites by queueing site visitors when a website experiences unmanageable surges in legitimate traffic that may otherwise bring an application down.

components.name: Workers
components.description: Cloudflare's JavaScript and WebAssembly execution service

components.name: Workers KV
components.description: Cloudflare's KV data store

components.name: Zero Trust Dashboard
components.description: Cloudflare Zero Trust Dashboard where customers can view and make changes to their Cloudflare Gateway configurations at https://dash.teams.cloudflare.com

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

We will be performing scheduled maintenance in PBH (Thimphu) datacenter on 2023-04-04 between 18:00 and 19:00 UTC. Traffic might be re-routed from this location, hence there is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during this maintenance window for end-users in the affected region. For PNI / CNI customers connecting with us in this location, please make sure you are expecting this traffic to fail over elsewhere during this maintenance window as network interfaces in this datacentre may become temporarily unavailable.
